pullRequest.title: Filter mtas by space id as well as mta id
pullRequest.bodyText:
When updating configuration subscriptions, mtas must be filtered by
space id as well, otherwise it would break mtas with same mta id in
different spaces.
LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1159

nodes.bodyText: I'd prefer passing the space GUID in addition to the MTA ID, instead of passing the context, since the context is just a map of variables. It's like passing everything to this method and allowing it to change it.
